about_the_game:
Turbo Fat reimagines classic 90s block-stacking games with a delicious twist -- new pieces, new moves, new ways to score, and tons of wacky level gimmicks! Misdrop? Just squish your way out of it! Build insane combos with no limits, 10, 20 or even 100 lines! But don't wait for line pieces, we got rid of those! (Hey, nobody said it would be easy...)

Fun and Forgiving for New Puzzlers

In Turbo Fat, there's no such thing as a bad move! Squish pieces through tight spaces and recover from misdrops with ease. Filling up your playfield is fine, too! You don't have to start over. And a helpful set of tutorials walks you through every step, making sure you're ready for the sweetest challenges ahead.

Extreme Challenges for Puzzle Pros

Ready to prove your puzzle prowess? Turbo Fat’s toughest levels demand expert strategy and lightning-fast reflexes! Stack pieces into high-scoring cakes and chain massive combos to keep your customers happy (and full!) With ultra-responsive controls, you can move and lock pieces the moment they spawn, unlocking incredible high-speed possibilities.

There's Something for Everyone

With over 100 levels packed with unique twists, Turbo Fat offers something for every type of player! Refine your strategies in Training mode, then tackle Adventure mode to unlock new regions, meet quirky characters, and grow your restaurant empire, one cake at a time.

Features

Sprawling Story. The game's unique Adventure mode gives you a new selection of levels each time you play. Progress through 6 distinct regions, unlocking over 100 levels with their own cutscenes and characters.

Clever Levels. Discover over 100 wildly inventive levels, each packed with surprises and unique gimmicks to keep you on your toes!

Different ways to practice. Master your skills with Training Modes like Score Attack and Time Attack, or relax in Sandbox Mode for endless, stress-free fun.

Cute creatures. Mix and match over 80 creature parts to craft your unique monsters, or meet quirky community-created characters in the story and puzzles.

Banging tunes. An original 19-song soundtrack composed by Pete Ellison of Diskowarp Records -- it'll keep your toes tapping while you play!

highlighted.name: Bake Like A Tree And Leave
The Terrible Secret Of Desert Q

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux/X11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (supports OpenGL 3.3)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Made with Godot

name: Turbo Fat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (supports OpenGL 3.3)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Made with Godot
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

short_description: A tasty twist on classic block stacking! Spin, squish and combine pieces to serve up delicious desserts. Explore 100 scrumptious levels, each with unique surprises and hilarious gimmicks. Team up with the mysterious Fat Sensei and grow your restaurant empire, catering to a cast of quirky creatures!
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
